means: 使（毛发等像鬃毛似的）直立

sentence.Network_en: It makes the hairs at the nape of the neck bristle.
Use a clean, medium bristle brush or medium nap roller.
sentence.Network_cn: 刷涂或辊涂时建议使用干净的中刚性毛刷或中等绒毛辊子.

sentence.Network_en: We were in urgent need of unbleached white bristle to produce brush.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们急需白猪鬃生产刷子.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from Old English  byrst (of Germanic origin, related to German Borste) + -le

entry.tran: 胡子茬儿；（胡须剃后长出的）粗硬短须；（男子头顶处的）短发
entry.def: Bristles are the short hairs that grow on a man's  chin after he has shaved. The hairs on the top of a man's head can also be called bristles when they are cut very short.

example.tran: 两天没剃长出的胡子茬儿

example.ex: He rubbed his hands over the soft bristles of his crew cut.
example.tran: 他用双手摸了摸他平头上柔软的短发。

entry.def: The bristles of a brush are the thick hairs or hair-like pieces of plastic which are attached to it.

example.ex: As soon as the bristles on your toothbrush begin to wear, throw it out.
example.tran: 牙刷毛一开始磨损，就把它扔掉。

entry.def: Bristles are thick, strong animal hairs that feel hard and rough.

example.ex: It has a short stumpy tail covered with bristles.
example.tran: 它粗短的尾巴上鬃毛浓密。

entry.tran: （因寒冷、恐惧或愤怒）毛发直立
entry.def: If the hair on a person's or animal's body bristles, it rises away from their skin because they are cold, frightened, or angry.

example.ex: It makes the hairs at the nape of the neck bristle...
Cats yowl. My dog's hair bristles in response.
example.tran: 这些猫的哀叫引得我的狗毛发竖立。

entry.def: If you bristle at something, you react to it angrily, and show this in your expression or the way you move.

example.ex: Ellis bristles at accusations that Berkeley's experiment is ill-conceived...
example.tran: 埃利斯对有人指责伯克利的实验考虑不够周密感到气愤。

example.ex: He bristled with indignation at the suggestion that he was racist.
example.tran: 有人暗示他是个种族主义者，他对此十分恼火。

entry.def: If you say that a place or thing bristles with people or with other things, you are emphasizing that it contains a great number of them.

example.ex: The country bristles with armed groups...
example.tran: 这个国家到处都是武装团伙。

example.ex: The idea fairly bristles with controversy...
example.tran: 这个想法存有诸多争议。

means.word_mean: 1. a stiff fiber (coarse hair or filament); natural or synthetic
1. be in a state of movement or action;

sentences.sentence: "It was a sight to make one's hair uprise!"

auth_sentence.content: You could be saddled with horse, I bristle.
auth_sentence.res_content: You could be saddled with horse, I bristle.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You could be saddled with horse, I bristle.

auth_sentence.content: He would bristle all the land with castles.
auth_sentence.res_content: He would bristle all the land with castles.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He would bristle all the land with castles.

auth_sentence.content: Indeed, polychaetes are sometimes referred to as bristle worms.
auth_sentence.res_content: Indeed, polychaetes are sometimes referred to as bristle worms.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Indeed, polychaetes are sometimes referred to as bristle worms.

means.word_mean: 短而硬的毛发, 刷子毛

sentences.en: His chin was covered with bristles.
The brush is made of animal bristles.
sentences.cn: 刷子是用动物的鬃毛制成的。

means.word_mean: 被激怒, 怒发冲冠; 毛发(因惊惧等)直立

sentences.en: The dog's hair bristled when the visitors came to the door.
sentences.cn: 当来访者走近大门时, 那条狗的毛都竖起来了。

sentences.en: They bristled at his denigrating description of their activities.
sentences.cn: 听到他在污蔑他们的活动, 他们都怒发冲冠。

jushi.english: The brush is made of animal bristles.
jushi.chinese: 刷子是用动物的鬃毛制成的。

jushi.english: His chin was covered with bristles.
The dog's hair bristled when the visitors came to the door.
jushi.chinese: 当来访者走近大门时，那条狗的毛都竖起来了。
